fields.title: Fisherman speak out following trial
fields.excerpt: “We intended to challenge it and we did. And today after all those years and all that heartache and all that stress, we finally got a result that we think is right.”
fields.vf_content: “We intended to challenge it and we did. And today after all those years and all that heartache and all that stress, we finally got a result that we think is right.”
fields.vf_description: Video from courthouse steps where defendents talk about the case
